main_definition: Ambien is a brand name for the medication zolpidem, which is commonly prescribed to treat insomnia or difficulty falling asleep.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A generic term referring to sleeping pills
meanings_and_examples.example: After a long day of work, he took some Ambien to help him fall asleep.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A brand name for the medication zolpidem used in treating insomnia or difficulty falling asleep
meanings_and_examples.example: His doctor prescribed Ambien to help him sleep better at night.
